body_html:
I'm not sure I'd describe the old behavior a problem or a bug. This just appears to be round instead of floor. I'm assuming there's a performance advantage to using + 0.5 instead of tf.round?

@yifeif What's wrong with the Closure Rules dependency? How can I help?

body:
I'm not sure I'd describe the old behavior a problem or a bug. This just appears to be round instead of floor. I'm assuming there's a performance advantage to using `+ 0.5` instead of `tf.round`?

@yifeif What's wrong with the Closure Rules dependency? How can I help?
